title: Best Amazon Prime Big Deals Day cycling savings – including 50% off a Tacx indoor trainer
content:
The 2023 Amazon Prime Big Deal Day has a number of great savings for cycling, from indoor training equipment to smartwatches, bike computers and clothing.

We’ve divided our pick into the best deals in the UK and USA. You can skip to the best deals in the UK or USA by hitting the links below:

  • Indoor training deals UK
  • Indoor training deals US
  • Accessories deals UK
  • Accessories deals US

When is Amazon Prime Big Deal Days?

Amazon has announced its second Prime Day event of the year. Named Amazon Prime Big Deal Days, it will kick off at midnight on Tuesday the 10th of October and will run all the way through to the end of Wednesday the 11th of October.

If you’re looking at smartwatches, it’s a good time to pick up a bargain on Garmin and Fitbit’s wrist-based fitness and performance trackers. The deals are open to Amazon Prime members, while non-members can gain access by signing up for a free 30-day Prime trial.

We’ve done the hard work for you and picked out our favourite deals on smartwatches, but you’ll find plenty more Prime Day smartwatch offers on Amazon, too.

Indoor Training Deals UK

Tacx Boost Trainer (£299.99 £169.99)

  • Buy now from Amazon (£169.99)

The Tacx Boost Trainer is a budget-friendly option for indoor cycling enthusiasts. With 10 adjustable resistance settings and compatibility with Zwift via the included speed sensor, it’s a convenient and versatile choice for riders looking to enhance their training experience without breaking the bank. Plus, you can save 26 per cent during the Amazon Prime Big Deal Days event.

  • Buy now from Amazon (£169.99)

Philips Air Performer 2-in-1 Purifier & Fan (£429.99 £319.99)

  • Buy now from Amazon (£429.99 £319.99)

A fan is key when training indoors, as you won’t benefit from the cooling effect of a natural breeze. The Philips Air Performer 2-in-1 Purifier & Fan is powered by AI to automatically clean the air and cool you down when needed.

With adjustable airflow direction and rotation up to 350 degrees, its bladeless design creates a consistent stream of clean airflow almost silently, controllable via the Air+ app. You can save 26 per cent during the Amazon Prime Big Deal Days event.

  • Buy now from Amazon (£429.99 £319.99)

Pro Breeze 16-Inch Pedestal Fan (£99.99 £69.99)

  • Buy now from Amazon (£99.99 £69.99)

For a more traditional design, the Pro Breeze 16-inch Pedestal Fan is a powerful option that won’t break the bank. The fan is adjustable to a height between 115cm and 135cm, and you can switch between the 4 modes of operation and 3-speed settings using the remote, which will come in handy when you need an extra boost of cooling airflow mid-ride. You can save 30 per cent over the next two days with Amazon Prime Big Deal Days.

  • Buy now from Amazon (£99.99 £69.99)

Beats Fit Pro (£219.99 £168.99)

  • Buy now from Amazon (£168.99).

 

The Beats Fit Pro sweat-resistant earbuds not only deliver powerful, balanced sound through a custom acoustic platform but also offer an immersive experience with Spatial Audio and dynamic head tracking for music, movies, and games.

With Active Noise Cancelling and Transparency Mode, enhanced by the Apple H1 chip for Automatic Switching and “Hey Siri” support, these IPX4-rated earbuds provide up to 6 hours of listening time and are perfect for an active lifestyle. Get them for 23 per cent off during the Amazon Prime Big Deal Days event.

  • Buy now from Amazon (£168.99).

Sennheiser MOMENTUM True Wireless 3 Earbuds (£229.99 £169.00)

  • Buy now from Amazon (£169.00).

With a compact ergonomic design, various ear adapters, and silicone tips for a secure fit, these earbuds offer superior comfort and voice detection, ensuring clear speech without ambient noise. Plus, their IPX4 splash resistance and up to 28 hours of playtime makes them ideal for on-the-go use and workouts.

Enjoy quality Sennheiser sound during your training session with 27 per cent off during the Amazon Prime Big Deal Days event.

  • Buy now from Amazon (£169.00).

soundcore by Anker Liberty 3 Pro Noise Cancelling Earbuds (£109.99 £79.99)

  • Buy now from Amazon (£79.99).

Enjoy comfortable, quality sound for up to 32 hours of playtime with the soundcore by Anker Liberty 3 pro earphones. Despite costing less than other quality earphones in our list, the Liberty 3 Pro earbuds have been recommended by 20 Grammy award-winning producers. Give them a go and save 27 per cent over the next two days.

  • Buy now from Amazon (£79.99).

Indoor Training Deals US

Wahoo KICKR CORE ($599.99 $569.99)

  • Buy now from Amazon ($569.99)

The Kickr Core is Wahoo’s direct-drive smart trainer built with the same internals as the original Kickr.

With impressive power accuracy, a maximum resistance of 1,800 watts, and compatibility with popular cycling apps like Zwift and TrainerRoad, it’s the ideal choice for cyclists looking to take their indoor training to the next level. Plus, it accommodates both quick-release and thru-axle frames, ensuring versatility for all riders. Now available for 5 per cent off during the Amazon Prime Big Deal Days event.

  • Buy now from Amazon ($569.99)

Tacx Boost Trainer ($299.99 $149.99)

  • Buy now from Amazon ($149.99)

The Tacx Boost turbo trainer is a budget-friendly option for indoor cycling enthusiasts. With 10 adjustable resistance settings and compatibility with Zwift via the included speed sensor, it’s a convenient and versatile choice for riders looking to enhance their training experience without breaking the bank.

For our friends across the pond, you can make almost double the savings of readers here in the UK, with 50 per cent off during the Amazon Prime Big Deal Days event.

  • Buy now from Amazon ($149.99)

Wahoo KICKR SNAP Wheel-On Bike Resistance Trainer ($349.99 $299.99)

  • Buy now from Amazon ($299.99)

As the younger sibling of the original Kickr, the electromagnetic Snap offers a great road feel, smooth transitions between resistance levels and an easy set-up.

Quiet operation and compatibility with popular apps like Zwift and TrainerRoad make it an essential tool for cyclists seeking an engaging and effective workout experience. Now save 14 per cent off during the Amazon Prime Big Deal Days event.

  • Buy now from Amazon ($299.99)

Original Peloton Bike ($1,445.00 $1,095)

  • Buy now from Amazon ($1,095)

You can save 24 per cent on the original Peloton bike this Amazon Prime Day. It offers an immersive cardio experience that goes beyond cycling. Its compact design and adjustable features make it perfect for small spaces, and with a Peloton All-Access Membership, you’ll gain access to a wealth of engaging content to fuel your workouts. Join the Peloton community and transform your home into a fitness hub.

  • Buy now from (Amazon $1,095)

Apple 2021 10.2-inch iPad ($398.00 $303.00)

  • Buy now from Amazon ($398.00 $303.00)

If you’ve been meaning to invest in an iPad to enhance your workouts, now’s the best time to grab one. Get 23 per cent off the 10.2-inch Apple iPad with AppleCare+ during the Amazon Prime Big Deal Days event.

  • Buy now from Amazon ($398.00 $303.00)

KEN BROWN 14 Inch High Velocity Floor Fan ($69.77 $55.82)

  • Buy now from Amazon ($55.82)

 

Looking for a fan for your pain cave? Save 20% this Amazon Prime Big Deal Days on this KEN BROWN 14 Inch High Velocity Floor Fan.

  • Buy now from Amazon ($55.82)

Raycon Fitness Headphones ($119.99 $83.99)

  • Buy now from Amazon ($83.99)

Introducing the Raycon fitness headphones, offering a wireless over-the-ear design with quick-dry, breathable, and comfortable cushions for a forgettable wearing experience. These headphones come with Active Noise Cancellation for distraction-free focus and an Awareness mode to stay aware of your surroundings. Now available for 30 per cent off this Amazon Prime Day.

  • Buy now from Amazon ($83.99)

JLab JBuds Air Sport True Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds ($69.99 $48.92)

  • Buy now from Amazon ($48.92)

Experience ultimate sport functionality with the JBuds Air Sport wireless earbuds. With a long-lasting battery life, sweatproof design, and secure fit, these earbuds are perfect for workouts and outdoor activities.

They feature stereo audio calling for crystal clear conversations and provide Be Aware Audio to stay aware of your surroundings. Plus, you can customize your sound with three EQ modes, all without the need for an app. Save 30 per cent during the Amazon Prime Big Deal Days event.

  • Buy now from Amazon ($48.92)

AfterShokz Aeropex ($206.91 $144.99)

  • Buy now from Amazon ($144.99)

TheAfterShokz Aeropex is an open-ear headphone that uses bone conduction technology to deliver premium audio while keeping you aware of your surroundings. Lightweight and comfortable, it offers up to 8 hours of continuous music and call time, all in a sweat and waterproof design with a convenient multifunction button for easy control. Save 30 per cent during the Amazon Prime Big Deal Days event.

  • Buy now from Amazon ($144.99)

Accessories Deals UK

Garmin Edge 130 Plus

  • Buy now from Amazon (£109.99)

For a truly diminutive option, the Garmin Edge 130 Plus is a sleek and simple training tool with a crisp 1.8-inch grayscale screen and easy-to-use external buttons. While it maintains the standout display from the original 130, it retains its compact dimensions, making it a convenient companion for your rides.

Although you can’t customize data screens through the app, it offers valuable performance metrics like VO2 max, heart rate, and power, making it a compelling choice for cyclists seeking essential data in a compact package.

Read our full review of the Garmin Edge 130 Plus and click below to save 35 per cent during the Amazon Prime Big Deal Days event.

  • Buy now from Amazon (£109.99)

Garmin Instinct Solar (£319.99 £207)

  • Buy now from Amazon (£207)

When Garmin launched the Instinct Solar, it offered to make recharging a thing of the past, when set on its most economical mode. That’s thanks to the solar charging built into the Instinct Solar’s face.

You get all Garmin’s fitness tracking functionality too, including up to 38 hours of GPS tracking, Pulse Ox, heart rate monitoring and LiveTrack location reporting via a smartphone.

Make a huge saving this Amazon Prime Big Deal Days, now with 35 per cent off.

  • Buy now from Amazon (£207)

Accessories Deals US

Garmin Edge 1030 Plus ($499.99 $399.99)

  • Buy now from Amazon ($399.99)

The Edge 1030 Plus is arguably the ultimate bike computer. It’s packed with every feature you need, boasting an updated processor, improved touchscreen, and a remarkable 24-hour battery life (extendable to 48 hours). With 32GB of internal storage and the Trailforks trail database, it’s your go-to companion for epic rides

You can read our full Garmin Edge 1030 Plus review and click below to save 25 per cent during the Amazon Prime Big Deal Days event.

  • Buy now from Amazon ($399.99)

Garmin Forerunner 745 ($399.99 $279.99)

  • Buy now from Amazon ($279.99)

The Garmin Foreunner 745 is a GPS-equipped smartwatch that provides activity tracking alongside training analytics on metrics including VO2 max, training load, training status, and aerobic and anaerobic training effects.

It has daily workout suggestions with advanced metrics for power when connected to a compatible power meter. It also provides comprehensive running data.

The watch syncs workouts and routes from popular apps, stores up to 500 songs, supports Garmin Pay, and tracks well-being metrics like sleep patterns and energy levels. It handles push notifications from social media, emails, and texts.

With a battery life of up to one week in smartwatch mode, 16 hours in GPS mode, and up to six hours in GPS mode with music, it’s available in four colours and comes with 30 per cent off this Amazon Prime Day.

  • Buy now from Amazon ($279.99)
